channel.title: Rare!@#!@@!@!
channel.description:
How do I change droprates for nex? Because when people kill nex it drops like torva every time. I can't find the npc id for nex in my NPCDrops.TSM
I am using PI but this is really annoying because it is ruining the eco can someone please help me. Where should i look next to change this?
Thanks guys

item.title: Rare!@#!@@!@!
item.dc:creator: @Lucas7 Lucas7
item.description:
@Lucas7 wrote:

Nex’s ID is 13447.

You should find the drops there.

Read full topic

item.description:

How is it dropping torva if it’s not in the NPCDrops.TSM?
